About.paragraph: The first-ever Vietnam Global Brand Summit™ 2024 is set to take place in Ho Chi Minh City, focusing on the imperative themes of sustainability with the pioneering Brand-Led Sustainability™ approach. The summit features an impressive lineup of policymakers, global and Vietnamese brand innovators, international industry leaders, sustainability experts, and influencers. It promises to be a groundbreaking series of events, offering deep insights into brand-led sustainability and its impact on consumer behavior and business growth globally.

Features.title: THE PURPOSE TO IMPACT™
Features.text: The Purpose to Impact™ Program is a transformative experience that helps leaders and their teams to uncover the unique gift they bring to the world—their purpose. Participants walk away with a deeper understanding of their individual characteristics that evoke confidence and inspire others to follow them when dealing with the unexpected.

Features.title: BRAND-LED SUSTAINABILITY FORUM
Features.text: An opportunity to meet, learn and collect valuable and actionable insights from brand-led sustainabilityTM game-changers,  industry leaders, and forward-thinking practitioners across various sectors. By integrating thought-provoking perspectives ignited from the summit, you’ll champion the brand-led sustainabilityTM transformation to drive brand innovation, consumer choices, and profitability.

Features.title: FEEDBACK LOOPS INTERNATIONAL ART EXHIBITION
Features.text: The exhibition gathers 40 artists from various countries around the world (Korea, New York, Japan, China) and Vietnam, as well as collectives and brands collaborating to explore different sustainable models, creating a space where art, technology, and society intersect. Under the theme 'Sustainability-driven Brands' of the Forum, the art exhibition designed to offer an 'immersive experience' for visitors. In this context, visitors can navigate through a world of images and choose their favorite content.

Features.title: KOTLER AWARDS
Features.text: Kotler Awards are developed to honour true excellence in the field of marketing and business management around the world. Kotler Award recognizes top marketing, communications, and business management professionals. At the same time, it will raise awareness of the creativity and originality delivered by practitioners at the forefront of their professions. This award also serves as a platform to showcase new start-ups and unique innovations which have set new standards for the industry, while highlighting winning strategies in this era of digitalization and the 4th industrial revolution.
